title: The Holocaust orphans
itunes:title: The Holocaust orphans
itunes:subtitle: Rebecca Clifford tells the stories of child survivors of the Holocaust who made their way to Britain after the war. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
As we approach the 75th anniversary of the liberation of Auschwitz, historian Rebecca Clifford tells the stories of child survivors of the Holocaust who made their way to Britain after the war. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
